name: beatbump
description: Beatbump is an alternative front-end for YouTube Music built with privacy in mind, allowing you to stream music without ads or tracking. Features include playlists, search, history, and a modern responsive interface.
features: YouTube Music Frontend: Privacy-focused alternative interface. No tracking.
Ad-Free Streaming: Listen without advertisements or interruptions. Clean experience.
No Tracking: Stream music without data collection. Complete privacy.
Playlist Support: Create and manage playlists. Organize your music.
Search Functionality: Find songs, albums, and artists easily. Quick discovery.
History Tracking: Keep track of your listening history. Remember favorites.
Modern Interface: Responsive, beautiful design. Great user experience.
Self-Hosted: Run your own music streaming frontend. Complete control.
